video.title: VGHS
video.synopsis: When Brian unknowingly beats an international gaming champion, he's swiftly admitted to the halls of the prestigious Video Game High School.

episodes.synopsis: After defeating a superstar video gamer player on national television, Brian D gets an invitation to the exclusive Video Game High School.
episodes.title: Welcome to VGHS

episodes.synopsis: Brian goes to an upperclassman party in hopes of impressing his crush, Jenny Matrix, but his plan becomes derailed when he encounters the Law.
episodes.title: Any Game in the House

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Jenny's relationship strengthens as she allows him to play on the JV team as they prepare to scrimmage the Law and the varsity squad.
episodes.title: The Long Arm of the Law

episodes.synopsis: Brian D suffers the consequences after inciting a fight with the Law. Ki tries to help Ted with becoming a drift racer, with disastrous results.
episodes.title: Everybody Comes to Brian's

episodes.synopsis: Brian comes back to prove that he belongs at VGHS by playing in the JV / varsity match, but the Law wants nothing more than to see him fail.
episodes.title: It's All About the Game

episodes.synopsis: The FPS team gets a new coach, causing turmoil between Brian and Jenny. Ki and Ted struggle with the most intense aspect of VGHS: homework.
episodes.title: Welcome to Varsity

episodes.synopsis: Brian gets some bad news from principal Calhoun, while the Law makes Ki's job of being hall monitor a total nightmare.
episodes.title: You Can't Stop a Sandwich

episodes.synopsis: Jenny is forced to write a speech for her mother; Ki's father comes for a visit, which causes major anxiety for Ted; Brian struggles with his new job.
episodes.title: Double XP Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Ki's principles as hall monitor come into question with the arrival of Brian's cat, Cheeto. Jenny makes a tough decision as the JV captain.
episodes.title: Thirty Foot Range

episodes.synopsis: The cheerful holiday of Leetmas becomes a stressful day for Brian, and the Law teams up with an unlikely partner to help expose Shane Pizza.
episodes.title: Some Like it Bot

episodes.synopsis: Brian and Jenny's bond is put to the test before the biggest match of their season. Ted tries to prove himself to the drifters.
episodes.title: Three Laps, Three Rounds, Three Words

episodes.synopsis: Jenny goes toe-to-toe with Ashley Barnstormer on an FPS talk show, while Ted reluctantly attempts to go on an MMO adventure with Brian.
episodes.title: OMGWTFPS!?

episodes.synopsis: On prom night, Ki gets caught up in a mystery noir, Brain has a night on the town with the FPS team and Jenny gets the flu.
episodes.title: Nobody Cool Goes to Prom

episodes.synopsis: The Law learns that he's become expendable, and Jenny and Brian face off against Napalm Energy Drink High School.
episodes.title: A Map to Sex Town

episodes.synopsis: The death of a teacher at VGHS forces Ted, Ki, Brian and Jenny to put their grievances aside as they spend the weekend at Ki's parents' home.
episodes.title: Video Game Home School

episodes.synopsis: Wendell tries to get Ki out of an existential crisis, Ted questions his place with the drifters, and Brian tries to win back a disheartened Jenny.
episodes.title: Being a Teen Is Hard, I Guess

episodes.synopsis: VGHS is destined to become a Napalm Mall and all hope seems lost -- until Ki comes up with an idea to take down the dreaded Barnstormer brothers.
episodes.title: The N64
